message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
Your turn Alice. I think a 55/45 split is more reflective of the decreasing value over time.
I'll compromise, 58-42 is as low as I can go for now.

Alice, we're running out of time! This is practically a 50/50 split when you consider the inflation. Let's be reasonable and close this deal.
